page.title: 11TO BE OLD IN BASSINGBOURN
page.content: The old people's homes are situated in Spring Lane. They provide a community for the aged. There is a meals on wheels service to feed those who can't get around or fear the outside world. Each year some of us visit the old people's centre to sing carols and share our Christmas happiness with them. The village has an Over 60's club where people go to play cards, talk and have a general get-together. By Pamela Qualter (Age 11) 17 more homes for old people are now being built behind the infant school.
